User’s Manual¶

The User's Manual for the ntpSystem package describes how to use the different containers and function to easily add, edit, and retrieve data.

Add/Edit Data¶

Multiple containers exist to enable easy addition and edit of data

  1. Material container: to define and add new materials.

  2. Steady state input container: to define all the inputs needed for a steday state simulation.

  3. …

Run calculations¶

  1. Steady state simulation.

  2. …

Process the Data¶

  1. Print steady-state results: allows to print results and provided inputs into a text file.

  2. …
